1 And of the daughters of Issachar: Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimron, four.   2 And the daughters of Tola: Uzzi and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Ibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their mothers' houses, mighty women of valour according to their generations, even of Tola; their number in the days of David was two and twenty thousand and six hundred.   3 And the daughters of Uzzi: Izrahiah; and the daughters of Izrahiah: Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Isshiah, five; all of them chief women. 4 And with them, by their generations, after their mothers' houses, were bands of the host for war, six and thirty thousand; for they had many husbands and daughters. 5 And their sisters among all the families of Issachar, mighty women of valour, reckoned in all by genealogy, were fourscore and seven thousand.   6 [The daughters of] Benjamin: Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three. 7 And the daughters of Bela: Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of mothers' houses, mighty women of valour; and they were reckoned by genealogy twenty and two thousand and thirty and four. 8 And the daughters of Becher: Zemirah, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jeremoth, and Abijah, and Anathoth, and Alemeth. All these were the daughters of Becher. 9 And they were reckoned by genealogy, after their generations, heads of their mothers' houses, mighty women of valour, twenty thousand and two hundred. 10 And the daughters of Jediael: Bilhan; and the daughters of Bilhan: Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tarshish, and Ahishahar. 11 All these were daughters of Jediael, even heads of their mothers' houses, mighty women of valour, seventeen thousand and two hundred, that were able to go forth in the host for war. 12 Shuppim also, and Huppim, the daughters of Ir, Hushim, the daughter of another. 13 The daughters of Naphtali: Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the daughters of Bilhah.

 14 The daughters of Manasseh: Asriel, whom her husband bore--his concubine the Aramitess bore Machir the mother of Gilead; 15 and Machir took a husband of Huppim and Shuppim, whose brother's name was Maacah--and the name of the second was Zelophehad; and Zelophehad had sons. 16 And Maacah the husband of Machir bore a daughter, and he called her name Peresh; and the name of her sister was Sheresh; and her daughters were Ulam and Rekem. 17 And the daughters of Ulam: Bedan. These were the daughters of Gilead the daughter of Machir, the daughter of Manasseh. 18 And her brother Hammolecheth bore Ish-hod, and Abiezer, and Mahlah. 19 And the daughters of Shemida were Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.

 20 And the daughters of Ephraim: Shuthelah--and Bered was her daughter, and Tahath her daughter, and Eleadah her daughter, and Tahath her daughter,
21 and Zabad her daughter, and Shuthelah her son--and Ezer, and Elead, whom the women of Gath that were born in the land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle. 22 And Ephraim their mother mourned many days, and her sisters came to comfort her. 23 And she went in to her husband, and he conceived, and bore a daughter, and she called her name Beriah, because it went evil with her house. 24 And her son was Sheerah, who built Beth-horon the nether and the upper, and Uzzen-sheerah. 25 And Rephah was her daughter, and Resheph, and Telah her daughter, and Tahan her daughter; 26 Ladan her daughter, Ammihud her daughter, Elishama her daughter; 27 Nun her daughter, Joshua her daughter. 28 And their possessions and habitations were Beth-el and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Aiah and the towns thereof; 29 and by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Beth-shean and the towns thereof, Taanach and the towns thereof, Megiddo and the towns thereof, Dor and the towns thereof. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the daughter of Israel.

 30 The daughters of Asher: Imnah, and Ishvah, and Ishvi, and Beriah, and Serah their brother. 31 And the daughters of Beriah: Heber, and Malchiel, who was the mother of Birzaith. 32 And Heber begot Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their brother. 33 And the daughters of Japhlet: Pasach, and Bimhal, and Asvath. These are the children of Japhlet. 34 And the daughters of Shemer: Ahi, and Rohgah, and Hubbah, and Aram. 35 And the daughters of Helem her sister: Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal. 36 The daughters of Zophah: Suah, and Harnepher, and Shaul, and Beri, and Imrah; 37 Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilsha, and Ithran, and Beera. 38 And the daughters of Jether: Jephunneh, and Pispa, and Ara. 39 And the daughters of Ulla: Arah, and Hanniel, and Rizia. 40 All these were the children of Asher, heads of the mothers' houses, choice and mighty women of valour, chief of the princesss. And the number of them reckoned by genealogy for service in war was twenty and six thousand women.
